message.body: Hey!! Ended up going to movie yesterday instead. It was cute! By chance did you send Bev your paperwork? Want to make sure you get paid in a timely fashion!
Also, are you around this weekend or next to maybe shoot a fire? Would be used as b roll. Trying to set something up with the fire crew.

This wknd works. The next wknd isn't good except maybe Sun or Mon. Could you get the 20mm and 100mm lens and a tripod from U arts? I ordered a tripod but it hasn't arrived yet. I still need to send stuff to Bev..
Okay I'll get those things from uarts. I'll let you know about the weekend ASAP
